item.title: Emacs Devanagari Support
item.description: Command Description C-x RET C-\ devanagari-itrans Change input method to देवनागरी C-\ Toggle between Hindi and English

item.title: An Introduction to GNU/Linux Commandline Interface
item.description: Introduction A personal computer is intended to provide user interaction. The user executes some program which runs on top of the computer's operating system and get the output. There are two types of interfaces available to do your work: Graphical (User) Interface (GUI): Stuff like you click some icon which invokes the related program or does some work in an already running application. This is available through a Desktop Environment
